headline: 6 Growth Stocks for a Bull Market
summary: One of the best ways to invest in it, though, is through select growth stocks.  It has held at these levels even as Israel and Iran have exchanged attacks in recent days—causing oil prices to jump.  Higher oil prices aren’t exactly what investors want, when President Donald Trump’s tariffs already threaten to stoke a bit of inflation, keeping the Federal Reserve on hold from cutting interest rates.

headline: Nearly 75% of Riders Fear Robotaxi Safety – Yet Pay More for Waymo's Driverless Experience
summary: Waymo's self-driving taxis may not yet deliver the low-cost promise often associated with autonomous vehicles, but that isn't stopping riders from paying a premium — or worrying about safety. A new pricing study by ride data platform Obi, found 74% of riders cite safety as their top concern around robotaxis — even as they continue to choose Waymo's higher-priced service. In San Francisco, Waymo rides averaged $20.43, compared to $15.58 for UberX and $14.44 for Lyft Standard — a 31% to 41% markup

raw.headline: Nearly 75% of Riders Fear Robotaxi Safety – Yet Pay More for Waymo's Driverless Experience
raw.summary: Waymo's self-driving taxis may not yet deliver the low-cost promise often associated with autonomous vehicles, but that isn't stopping riders from paying a premium — or worrying about safety. A new pricing study by ride data platform Obi, found 74% of riders cite safety as their top concern around robotaxis — even as they continue to choose Waymo's higher-priced service. In San Francisco, Waymo rides averaged $20.43, compared to $15.58 for UberX and $14.44 for Lyft Standard — a 31% to 41% markup

headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Uber (UBER): Read This Before Placing a Bet

headline: What Will Tesla's Robotaxi Service Look Like in the Future? CEO Elon Musk Envisions a Combination of Uber and Airbnb.
summary: Tesla is reportedly just days away from launching its first 10-20 autonomous robotaxis in Austin, Texas.  CEO Elon Musk hopes to scale Tesla's robotaxi fleet significantly between now and the end of 2026.  Musk envisions a different kind of ride-hailing fleet than what's currently offered in the market.
